recipe.title: Chicory and Carrot Salad
ingredients: 2 teaspoon Sherry vinegar (available at specialty foods shops and supermarkets)
1 bunch of chicory, rinsed, spun dry, and torn into pieces (about 4 cups packed)
instructions: In a bowl whisk together the vinegar, the mustard, the sugar, the water, and salt and pepper to taste, add the oil in a stream, whisking, and whisk the dressing until it is emulsified. Add the chicory and the carrot and toss the salad well.
